caption: Figure 2: Left: VideoWebArena Video Difficulty Task Distribution. Right: VideoWebArena Agent Difficulty Task Distribution.
description: The chart shows the distribution of video and agent difficulty levels across tasks in the VideoWebArena benchmark.

caption: Figure 3: VideoWebArena Factual Retention Task Counts for Each Category. The categories are non-exclusive. One task can fall under multiple video perception categories.
description: The chart displays the number of factual retention tasks in VideoWebArena categorized by visual perception, audio perception, full video understanding, and temporal reasoning.
